SEARCH
Package businessLogic.repository

Interface Repository<T extends BaseEntity>

Type Parameters:
T - the type of the entity
All Known Implementing Classes:
CandidateRepository, ElectionRepository, VoterRepository, VotingRepository
public interface Repository<T extends BaseEntity>
This interface defines the basic operations for a repository.

  • Method Details

    • insert

      boolean insert(T entity)
      Inserts a new entity.
      Parameters:
      entity - the entity to be inserted
      Returns:
      true if the entity was inserted successfully, false otherwise

    • update

      boolean update(T entity)
      Updates an existing entity.
      Parameters:
      entity - the entity with updated information
      Returns:
      true if the entity was updated successfully, false otherwise

      boolean delete(int id)
      Deletes an entity.
      Parameters:

      Returns:
